alert_only_one_region_left: Only one segment left. You can not delete it!仅剩余一段，您不能删除它
config_update_error: An error occured while updating resource options更新资源选项时发生错误.
config_update_success: Options for the resource successfully updated.资源选项成功更新
creation_error_wrong_file_format: The given file format is not allowed (mp3 / wav)提供的文件格式不允许(mp3 / wav)
current_segment_help: Current region help当前区域帮助
delete_region_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this region确定删除此区域吗?
dialog_region_configure: Configure region help配置区域帮助
error_while_encoding: Error while encoding file编辑文件时出错.
error_while_uploading: Error while uploading file上传文件时出错.
help_modal_help_tab_label: Help available for the selected region当前区域帮助有效
help_modal_intro:
您可能错过了正确的区域.

您可以在当前和以前的区域之间进行选择（如果存在）.
在其他选项卡上，您将看到相应的帮助（如果存在）.
identified_region_helps: Below are the helps available for problems you pointed下列帮助有助于解决您所指出的问题
media_resource_options_explain: At least one view type should be enabled至少启用一种视图
media_resource_save_regions: Save resource regions and regions options保存资源区域和区域选项
move_backward: Go to previous marker返回前一个标记
move_forward: Go to next marker返回下一个标记
no_problems_detected_message_first: Congratulations ! You haven't pointed any problem祝贺你!你没有指出任何问题 !
no_problems_detected_message_second: If you want to restart please use the button below如果您想重新开始，请使用下列按钮 .
options_form_enable_text_transcription: Display textual transcription显示文本转录
options_form_tts_language: Text to speech language文本转语音
play_current_region: Play / Pause current region播放/暂停当前区域
popover_players_active: The student will access set helps when asking
popover_players_free: Help and region are shown as soon as pause is asked. This player can display text transcription只要暂停，就会显示帮助和区域。该播放器可以显示文本转录.
popover_players_live: The student will be able to listen freely to the document and acces loop & slow helps everywhere
popover_players_pause: The player will automatically pause playback (2s) on each region end玩家将自动暂停播放（2S）在每个区域结束
popover_players_scripted: 2步回放。首先，学生每次遇到问题，然后他访问相关帮助。
popover_transcription_popover_explain_fi: This field allow you to set the region text transcription此字段允许您设置区域文本的转录
popover_transcription_popover_explain_se: These data will be used by TextToSpeach这些数据将用一种自由播放的文本朗读方式 (i.e. Backward building help)
previous_region_help: Previous region help前一区域帮助
region_config: Configure help for the region区域配置帮助
region_config_allow_bwb: Allow backward building playback允许回放
region_config_allow_loop: Allow loop playback允许循环播放
region_config_allow_rate: Allow playback rate change允许播放速率改变
region_config_help_links_placeholder: 增加帮助链接如 (http://www.mylink.com) 或留空
region_config_help_texts_placeholder: Add a help text or leave empty增加帮助文凭或留空
region_delete_confirm_base: Are you sure you want to delete this region确定删除区块吗?
region_delete_confirm_sub:
这个区域与一个或多个帮助有关.
这些帮助可自行删除.
region_help_no_help_available: No help available for this region.
region_help_preview: Preview planned help for the current region预览当前区域计划的已计划帮助
region_help_related_segment_playback: Play the related region播放相关区域
region_help_segment_playback_backward: Play the region with backward building 回放
region_help_segment_playback_loop: Play the region in loop循环播放
region_help_segment_playback_rate: Play the region slower 慢放
region_help_view: See available help察看有效帮助
resource_update_error: An error occured while updating resource当更改资源时发生错误.
resource_update_success: Resource update successfull资源更改成功.
resource_zip_export: Export as zip file导出压缩文件
scirpted_active_flag_title: I've got a problem !我遇到了文件
scripted_active_explaination_first: Listen to the whole document自由地倾听文件.
scripted_active_explaination_second: If you encounter a comprehension problem press [spacebar] or click the flag button如果你遇到一个理解上的难题按[空格键]或单击旗帜按钮.
scripted_active_explaination_step2_first: You can listen freely to the document可以自由地倾听文件.
scripted_active_explaination_step2_secon: Comprehension help is proposed for every identified problem对每个已确认问题提出了理解帮助.
show_hide_annotation_panel: Show / Hide annotation panel显示/隐藏注解面板
show_hide_options_panel: Show / Hide options panel显示/隐藏选项面板
